description.value:
[Service]

Prerequisites Tier 0 with any faction

Cost 25 Fame (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Resurrect]{Resurrect}) or 50 Fame (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Raise Dead]{Raise Dead})

Effect The Pathfinder Society is invested in keeping its most successful agents in the field. You can purchase a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Resurrect]{Resurrect} ritual for 25 Fame. If you are in a rush to return to life and cannot wait the day for this ritual to be conducted, you can instead purchase a casting of the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Raise Dead]{Raise Dead} spell for 50 Fame.

Special This reward can be purchased multiple times, as it strictly represents the ability to secure the listed services.
